frameset.edef: to hold, establish or erect (to bring into existence)

example.parse:
Metaphorical extension
(TOP (S (CONJ و) (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تقيم) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP طرابلس)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_INDEF_ACC علاقات) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC جيدة)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (NOUN_PROP بيونغ) (NOUN_PROP يانغ))))) (PUNC .)))

(TOP (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (NP-1 (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الجيش) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM المغربي)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS أقام) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (PUNC ") (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مركز) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN مراقبة)) (PUNC ")) (PP-LOC (PREP على) (NP (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الجزيرة)) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN غير) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المأهولة)))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: an observation point on the uninhabited island

example.arg: " مركز مراقبة " على الجزيرة غير المأهولة

arg.g: on the occasion of the mother day
